alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:40PM MDT until July 13 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 640 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of Greenhorn Mountain, or 22 miles northeast of Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Walsenburg, Rye and Colorado City. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
